update H001_ORDERBOOK
TEN_CD = #{record.tenCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
BMN_CD = #{record.bmnCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
DPT_CD = #{record.dptCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
LINE_CD = #{record.lineCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
ITEM_CD = #{record.itemCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
SPECIAL_TYPE = #{record.specialType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELL_TYPE = #{record.sellType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVERY_DATE = #{record.deliveryDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
DAY = #{record.day,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLAN_CD = #{record.planCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
VENDOR_CD = #{record.vendorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COST_PRICE = #{record.costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELL_PRICE = #{record.sellPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ORDER_STATUS_DIV_2 = #{record.orderStatusDiv2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_STATUS_DIV_3 = #{record.orderStatusDiv3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STOCK_STATUS_DIV = #{record.stockStatusDiv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SP_ORDER_FIRST_FLG = #{record.spOrderFirstFlg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HO_ORDER_FLG_1 = #{record.hoOrderFlg1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HO_ORDER_FLG_2 = #{record.hoOrderFlg2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HO_ORDER_FLG_3 = #{record.hoOrderFlg3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

LOSS_QTY = #{record.lossQty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORDER_LIMIT_TIME_1 = #{record.orderLimitTime1,jdbcType=CHAR},

HO_FLG_2 = #{record.hoFlg2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
